modName: Thievish Nightingale Armor - More Enchantments for Thieves
summary: Mod adds new enchantment on most pieces of Nightingale Armor and slightly increases Armor Value of the higher level versions.
descriptionHtml:
The exact enchantments for every piece are:

[b]Level 1-18[/b]
[u]
Nightingale Hood:[/u]
Fortify Illusion 15%
Fortify Archery 15%
[u]
Nightingale Cuirass:[/u]
Fortify Stamina 20 points
Fortify Frost Resistance 15%
Fortify Carrying Capacity 20 points
[u]
Nightingale Gloves:[/u]
Unchanged
[u]
Nightingale Boots:[/u]
Muffle
Fortify Pickpocketing 15%

[b]Level 19-31[/b]
[u]
Nightingale Hood:[/u]
Fortify Illusion 17%
Fortify Archery 20%
[u]
Nightingale Cuirass:[/u]
Fortify Stamina 30 points
Fortify Frost Resistance 30%
Fortify Carrying Capacity 30 points
(Also increased Armor Value by 2 points)
[u]
Nightingale Gloves:[/u]
Unchanged
[u]
Nightingale Boots:[/u]
Muffle
Fortify Pickpocketing 20%

[b]Level 32+[/b]

[u]Nightingale Hood:[/u]
Fortify Illusion 20%
Fortify Archery 25%
[u]
Nightingale Cuirass:[/u]
Fortify Stamina 40 points
Fortify Frost Resistance 50%
Fortify Carrying Capacity 40 points
(Also increased Armor Value by 4 points)
[u]
Nightingale Gloves:[/u]
Unchanged

[u]Nightingale Boots:[/u]
Muffle
Fortify Pickpocketing 25%

As you can see, i added the Thieves Guild armor enchantments on most pieces (and in the Hoods case, the enchantment on Linwes Armor).
The enchantments i added are as strong as the Thieves Guild Armor enchantments on the first version and stronger on the following. They stay weaker than the enchantments on the Guild Master Armor, so there is still a reason to use it.
author: SoullessDB
